body:

replies.body:
#DeleteFizz2016 #MakeLeagueOfLegendsGreatAgain.

Seriously though, rework his E, remove that missing health% DOT on his W and remove the aa damage reduction on his passive. (The things that infuriate me when playing against a F***).

His E is fine, it's either a high source of damage or an escape. Look at Zed, his shadow is either an escape or a means of harass. And the DoT on his W isn't that bad unless you're really low, in which case ignite would kill you. The AA reduction is less than 15 at max level.

I'm pretty sure people give him more shit than he deserves but still, having a mini-Zhonya's on a 4 second cd is really frustrating to play against. The W dot does hurt even if you're at half health, and that aa damage reduction will be quite annoying to auto-attack based champions, especially those that prefer speed over damage. I play mages so I don't care about that. 
His kit is quite over-loaded though.

EDIT: I will admit though, he does require some skill to play properly, otherwsie he gets wrecked during laning.

His point was that nerfing assassins indirectly nerfs mages like ahri that have tons of mobility and can easily juke out keep skill shots (fizz ult) if timed properly. His post never referenced any hatred towards ahri, he just said that "Why am I not surprised an ahri main is complaining about wanting assassin's nerfed. It's obvious what your agenda is"
